DISCOVERING THE NATURE IS MY PASSION

[/vc_column_text][ultimate_heading sub_heading_color="#aaaaaa" spacer="line_only" spacer_position="bottom" line_height="2" line_color="#6e7d80" sub_heading_font_size="desktop:14px;" sub_heading_line_height="desktop:21px;" line_width="50" spacer_margin="margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:10px;"]

 The European languages are members of the same family. Their separate existence is a myth

[/ultimate_heading][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row"][vc_column width="1/2"][ult_animation_block animation="zoomIn" animation_duration="1" animation_delay="0" animation_iteration_count="1"][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1458417382971{border-top-width: 4px !important;border-right-width: 4px !important;border-bottom-width: 4px !important;border-left-width: 4px !important;padding-right: 20px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;border-left-color: #f1f1f1 !important;border-left-style: solid !important;border-right-color: #f1f1f1 !important;border-right-style: solid !important;border-top-color: #f1f1f1 !important;border-top-style: solid !important;border-bottom-color: #f1f1f1 !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}"][vc_column_inner][ultimate_spacer height="70" height_on_tabs="50" height_on_tabs_portrait="50" height_on_mob_landscape="30" height_on_mob="30"][vc_column_text]

AND NOW STARTS THE JOURNEY

[/vc_column_text][ultimate_heading sub_heading_color="#999999" spacer="line_only" spacer_position="bottom" line_height="2" line_color="#969c98" sub_heading_font_size="desktop:15px;" sub_heading_line_height="desktop:25px;" line_width="50" spacer_margin="margin-top:10px;margin-bottom:15px;"]

A wonderful serenity has taken possession of my entire soul, like these sweet mornings of spring which I enjoy with my whole heart. I am alone, and feel the charm of existence in this spot, which was created for the bliss of souls like mine. I am so happy, my dear friend, so absorbed in the exquisite sense of mere tranquil existence, that I neglect my talents

[/ultimate_heading][ultimate_icons align="uavc-icons-center" css_icon=".vc_custom_1458417506393{margin-top: 20px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}"][single_icon icon="Defaults-google-plus" icon_size="26" icon_margin="5" icon_color="#aaaaaa"][single_icon icon="Defaults-pinterest-p" icon_size="26" icon_margin="5" icon_color="#aaaaaa"][/ultimate_icons][ultimate_spacer height="70" height_on_tabs="50" height_on_tabs_portrait="50" height_on_mob_landscape="30" height_on_mob="30"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/ult_animation_block][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][sy_postmasonry columns_number="syp-item-2" post_number="4" gutter="true"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" css=".vc_custom_1458417621116{margin-bottom: 50px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2"][ult_animation_block animation="zoomIn" Day"][/ult_animation_block][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][ult_animation_block animation="zoomIn" animation_duration="1" animation_delay="0.2" animation_iteration_count="1"][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1458417827244{border-top-width: 1px !important;border-right-width: 1px !important;border-bottom-width: 1px !important;border-left-width: 1px !important;padding-right: 20px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;background-color: #141414 !important;border-left-color: #141414 !important;border-left-style: solid !important;border-right-color: #141414 !important;border-right-style: solid !important;border-top-color: #141414 !important;border-top-style: solid !important;border-bottom-color: #141414 !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}"][vc_column_inner][ultimate_spacer height="70" height_on_tabs="50" height_on_tabs_portrait="50" height_on_mob_landscape="30" height_on_mob="30"][vc_column_text]

CHILLING OUT ON THE BEACH

[/vc_column_text][ultimate_heading sub_heading_color="#999999" spacer="line_only" spacer_position="bottom" line_height="2" line_color="#969c98" sub_heading_font_size="desktop:15px;" sub_heading_line_height="desktop:25px;" line_width="50" spacer_margin="margin-top:10px;margin-bottom:15px;"]

A wonderful serenity has taken possession of my entire soul, like these sweet mornings of spring which I enjoy with my whole heart. I am alone, and feel the charm of existence in this spot, which was created for the bliss of souls like mine. I am so happy, my dear friend, so absorbed in the exquisite sense of mere tranquil existence, that I neglect my talents

[/ultimate_heading][ultimate_spacer height="70" height_on_tabs="50" height_on_tabs_portrait="50" height_on_mob_landscape="30" height_on_mob="30"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/ult_animation_block][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" full_height="yes" bg_type="image" parallax_style="vcpb-default" bg_image_new="id^132|url^http://sayenthemes.com/modernblog-demo/wp-content/uploads/sites/23/2016/03/beardnature.jpg|caption^null|alt^null|title^beardnature|description^null" css=".vc_custom_1458668944412{margin-top: 70px !important;padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2"][ult_animation_block animation="fadeInLeft" animation_duration="1" animation_delay="0" animation_iteration_count="1"][vc_column_text]

My Name is Nabil Lahssine

I'm a Nature lover & this is my Blog

[/vc_column_text][ultimate_heading sub_heading_color="#777777" alignment="left" spacer="line_only" line_height="2" line_color="#969c98" sub_heading_font_size="desktop:15px;" sub_heading_line_height="desktop:25px;" line_width="50" spacer_margin="margin-top:15px;margin-bottom:15px;" sub_heading_margin="margin-bottom:30px;"]

When, while the lovely valley teems with vapour around me, and the meridian sun strikes the upper surface of the impenetrable foliage of my trees, and but a few stray gleams steal into the inner sanctuary, I throw myself down among the tall grass by the trickling stream; and, as I lie close to the earth, a thousand unknown plants are noticed by me: when I hear the buzz of the little world among the stalks, and grow familiar with the countless indescribable forms of the insects and flies, then I feel the presence of the Almighty, who formed us in his own image, and the breath of that universal love which bears and sustains us, as it floats around us in an eternity of bliss; and then, my friend, when darkness overspreads my eyes, and heaven and earth seem to dwell in my soul and absorb its power, like the form of a beloved mistress, then I often think with longing, Oh, would I could describe these conceptions, could impress upon paper all that is living so full and warm within me, that it might be the mirror of my soul, as my soul is the mirror of the infinite God!

[/ultimate_heading][ult_buttons btn_title="Read More" btn_size="ubtn-custom" btn_width="180" btn_height="40" btn_title_color="#ffffff" btn_bg_color="#444444" btn_hover="ubtn-left-bg" btn_bg_color_hover="#000000" icon="Defaults-long-arrow-right" icon_size="20" icon_color="#ffffff" btn_icon_pos="ubtn-sep-icon-at-right" btn_font_size="desktop:17px;" btn_line_height="desktop:40px;"][/ult_animation_block][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row_content"][vc_column width="1/4" css=".vc_custom_1458426751814{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-right: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}"][ult_animation_block animation="fadeInLeft" animation_duration=".7" animation_delay="0" animation_iteration_count="1"][bsf-info-box icon="icomoon-map" icon_size="46" title="Choosing Destination" pos="left" title_font_size="desktop:18px;" title_font_line_height="desktop:3px;" title_font_color="#333333" desc_font_size="desktop:15px;" desc_font_color="#aaaaaa" css_info_box=".vc_custom_1458428106776{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-right: 10px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 10px !important;}"]First Step[/bsf-info-box][/ult_animation_block][ult_animation_block animation="fadeInRight" animation_duration=".7" animation_delay="0" animation_iteration_count="1"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1458428073050{margin-top: 13px !important;margin-bottom: 10px !important;padding-right: 10px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 10px !important;}"]
